name: 2048 The Game
description:
This is exciting puzzle game with barley-break and tetris-like mechanics.

To move tiles on the grid use the finger swipe gesture in desired direction.

When one tile move toward to another tile and they have same number, they merged into the new tile with tile number multiplied by two. For example tiles with number 2 turns into 4, 4 turns to 8, 8 to 16, 16 to 32 and so on.

Your goal is to collect tile with 2048 value.
